quest.name: Put Your Plasma Where Your Mouth Is
journal:
 Quest Sync
A member of the Immortal Flames is looking for a hero brave enough to wield a mighty weapon and fell a colossus.
objectives: Speak to the Immortal Flame delegate near the station.
Wait at the specified location and stop the colossi with the magitek weapon.
Speak with the Immortal Flame delegate.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: If it isn't Forename[GC Rank] Surname. Your timing is fortuitous. There is a request I would make of you, one on the more perilous side.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: As you know, we are working day and night to escort this city's residents to safety. Unfortunately, some magitek colossi seek to undermine our efforts, but to directly engage them would result in catastrophic collateral damage.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: Luckily, it need not come to that. Garlond Ironworks has a product known as a magitek plasma cannon. That means nothing to me, I confess, but word is this creation of theirs is capable of stopping a warmachina dead in its tracks.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: Sounds too good to be true, I know. Well, here's the rub: this silver bullet is a damned costly thing to develop, and they don't want just anyone handling it. Cid put your name forward, though. He thought you would acquit yourself well of this task.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: I know it is a deal to ask, but should you decide to aid us in our efforts, we will be waiting near the station.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: Your assistance is greatly appreciated, ma'amsir. I will distract the colossi, allowing you ample time to take aim with your newly appointed weapon.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: If the engineers are to be believed, scoring a direct hit will send a powerful current through the giant's systems and ultimately disable it.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: I will draw those menacing machines toward me. While they are distracted, use this new weapon of yours and make them regret interfering with our cause.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search your surroundings for the magitek colossi. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the machina and disable it with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The colossi approach! Be warned that should the Immortal Flame delegate retreat, your mission will be judged a failure.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Strike three magitek colossi with your new weapon to silence them for good.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: Excellent shooting, Forename! Now those wretched machina have been dispatched, we will be able to deliver the citizens to safety.

dialogue.name: FLAMESOLDIER04234
dialogue.text: Before I return to the station to join the escort, I shall send word to Camp Broken Glass of your success. My superior officer Ambaghai will await you with your reward, I'll make sure of it.

dialogue.name: AMBAGHAI
dialogue.text: Good to have you among us again, Forename. I've heard of your triumph in taking down those behemoth warmachina, and have prepared you a reward commensurate with your efforts.

dialogue.name: AMBAGHAI
dialogue.text: That piece of artillery proved as effective as Garlond Ironworks intimated. But such is to be expected. Their craftsmanship is well-renowned, and their latest efforts redound to their credit.

dialogue.name: AMBAGHAI
dialogue.text: Alas, we were told not to expect more of its type─at least any time soon. According to a letter we received, its crafting was only made possible through the work of a rather ambitious employee...and a mountain of gil. Production of it on a large scale will prove impossible.

dialogue.name: AMBAGHAI
dialogue.text: Expenses notwithstanding, you were able to wield this foreign ordnance with great aplomb. Though it is but a trifle compared to the valor shown, I offer you this as a show of gratitude.
